Class-Cleric 20 -- Male Versatile Human Cleric: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Acrobat Deity: Abadar
Experience: 19276/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 10/15
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Hardy Traveler: +10' Speed during overland travel

Feature Notes:
Advanced General Training: +1 General Feat (up to 7th level)
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Cleric Feats: 10 selections
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Cloistered Cleric: +1 Class Feat (Domain Initiate feat)
Deity: Has the Anathema and Sanctification features
Divine Font: 1 selection
Doctrine: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Sanctification: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Versatile Human: +1 General Feat
Warpriest: Has the Deadly Simplicity feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Adopted Ancestry (Goblin): May take Goblin ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by Abadar
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Mercantile Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Absalom Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Nature: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Accounting Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Desert Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +24 (intelligence; untrained)
Acrobatics: +26 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +24 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +24 (charisma; untrained)

Cleric Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 6 from any)
Deity And Cause: Society
Deity: Skill Trained (Society)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Baking Lore): Skill Trained (Baking Lore)
Skill Training (Deception): Skill Trained (Deception)
Skill Training (Desert Lore): Skill Trained (Desert Lore)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 8 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Magic Hands: Successful Medicine to Treat Wounds restores d10s +20 HP
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Forest): +1 Survival in Forest
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge with on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 228 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity (3 max); expert) Class DC: Cleric: 36 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Padded Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Composite Longbow (+28 1d8+2 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Fist (+28 1d4+4 B; strength; expert); Flail (+28 1d6+4 B; strength; expert); Longsword (+28 1d8+4 S/P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Deadly Simplicity: Crossbow inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Crossbow)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Defense: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Shortbow): Weapon Familiarity (Shortbow)
Warpriest: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Crossbow)
Channel Smite: (2) Adds the damage from Heal or Harm to a melee Strike
Cloistered Cleric: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Communal Healing: Crossbow inflicts +1 damage die step
Divine Rebuttal: (R) Successful Strike with crossbow give allies +2 vs. triggering magic effect
Inviolable: Successful attacks on self inflict 3d6 HP spirit, holy, or unholy on attacker
Lasting Armament: Has increased Align Armament effects
Rapid Response: (R) +10 Speed to Stride toward an ally reduced to 0 Hit Points
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strikes with a crossbow give self 10 temporary Hit Points, or 20 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, until the start of the next turn
Restorative Strike: (2) Successful Strike (+1 with crossbow after healing self restores save number of Hit Points to another willing creature
Sanctify Armament: (1) Touched weapon gains holy or unholy trait, inflicting +2d6 HP spirit for 1 to opposed creatures
Sapping Symbol: (R) Raised symbol and a successful Religion check when taking melee damage inflicts enfeebled 1 on the attacker, or enfeebled 2 on a critical success, until the attacker moves away
Shared Replenishment: Can give the temporary Hit Points from Replenishment Of War to any ally within 10'
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest's Armor-1: Treats armor of 2 Bulk or higher as 1 Bulk lighter
Warpriest: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +29 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Cloistered Cleric: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolute Faith: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Master (Fortitude)
Premonition Of Avoidance: (R) Gives +2 on save vs. triggering hazard
Premonition Of Clarity: Rerolls a failed mental save with a +2 bonus once per hr
Raise Symbol: (1) Gives +2 saves, and successes vs. vitality and void are critical successes, for 1 rd
Resolute Faith: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Shared Avoidance: Premonition Of Avoidance gives allies within 20' +2 vs. the triggering hazard
Shared Clarity: Premonition Of Clarity gives allies within 15' a +2 reroll vs. the triggering mental effect
Warpriest: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D10: 2; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 3; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Divine: +32 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 42 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Hurtling Stone (D1 Foc): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP)
Localized Quake (D4 Foc): (2) Choice of a 15' emanation or 15' cone inflicts 4d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save basic Reflex also negates knocked prone) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Domain (Earth): Knows the Localized Quake divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Cloistered Cleric: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Domain Initiate (Earth): Knows the Hurtling Stone divine spell/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Harming Hands: Increases Harm die type to d10
Healing Hands: Increases Heal die type to d10
Maker Of Miracles: +1 10th level spell slot
Miraculous Spell: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Warpriest: Spell Master (Divine)
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Avatar's Audience: Can speak for Abadar, conduct the Commune ritual to contact Abadar without cost, and use Plane Shift to travel to Abadar's realm once per day
Avatar's Protection: (R) Changes a foe critical hit no self to a normal hit and casts Avatar
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Cast Down: (1) Subsequent Harm or Heal also inflicts knocked prone, and target critical failure also inflicts -10 Speed for 1 min
Castigating Weapon: Inflicting damage using Harm or Heal with Divine Castigation gives weapons and unarmed Strikes the holy or unholy trait and additional spirit damage equal to the spell level until the end of turn
Channeling Block: Can expend a Harm or Heal with Shield Block to add 1d8 per spell level to the shield's Hardness
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Cremate Undead: Heal cast upon undead also inflicts persistent fire damage equal to the spell level
Defensive Recovery: (1) Subsequent healing cast on a single target also gives +2 Armor Class and saves for 1 rd
Deity's Protection: Casting a domain spell gives self resistance equal to the spell level to all damage until the start of the next turn
Deity: Has access to Illusory Object, Creation, and Planar Palace spells
Directed Channel: Can direct the effects of an area Harm or Heal into a 60' cone
Divine Apex: Can give a worn magic item the apex trait and increase its divine attribute value by 1 once per daily preparations
Divine Castigation: Can add holy or unholy train to Harm and Heal spells
Divine Infusion: Target of Harm or Heal inflicts +1d6 HP (+2d6 HP or +3d6 HP if cast at 5th or 8th rank) for 1 turn
Divine Weapon: (F) Using a divine spell slot causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP spirit, or +2d4 HP vs. opposed holy or unholy creatures, for the remainder of the turn once per turn
Domain Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Echoing Channel: (1) Subsequent 2-action Harm or Heal cast on a single target also causes single-action effects on an adjacent creature
Emblazon Antimagic: Can use Emblazon Armament to cause a shield to give a save bonus vs. magic and Shield Block vs. spells, or to cause 1 critical hit with a weapon to allow a +10 counteract attempt vs. a spell
Emblazon Armament: 10 min process gives a shield +1 Hardness or a weapon +1 HP damage
Emblazon Energy: Can use Emblazon Armament to cause a shield to give a save bonus and Shield Block vs. a chosen energy type, and to give it resistance 10 if the energy matches a known domain spell, or to cause a weapon to inflict +1d4 HP energy type damage, or +1d6 HP if the energy matches a known domain spell
Eternal Bane: R15' Aura gives continuous level 10 Bane effects
Eternal Blessing: R15' Aura gives continuous level 10 Bless effects
Fast Channel: Can use 2 actions to cast a 3-action Harm or Heal
Fortunate Relief: Counteract attempts from healing spells gain the better of 2 rolls
Harmful Font: Can cast Harm at level 9 an additional 6 times per day
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at level 9 an additional 6 times per day
Heroic Recovery: (1) Subsequent Heal cast on a single target also gives +5 Speed, +1 attack, and +1 HP damage until the end of its next turn
Improved Swift Banishment: Can sacrifice any 5th level or higher prepared spell to inflict Swift Banishment with a -2 save penalty
Martyr: (1) Subsequent healing spell transfers an additional 1d8 HP from self to target
Miraculous Possibility: Can leave a spell slot free during daily prep to later cast any spell 2 levels lower
Panic The Dead: Heal also inflicts frightened 1 on undead (save negates); critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Rebounding Smite: (R) Missed Strike using Channel Smite allows retargeting the Harm or Heal
Remediate: (F) 3-action Harm or Heal attempts to counteract a divine effect
Restorative Channel: Can cast Cleanse Affliction, Clear Mind, Sound Body, or Sure Footing in place of a prepared Heal
Resurrectionist: Restoring Hit Points to a dying or dead target also gives fast healing 5 for 1 min or until the target is knocked unconscious
Sacred Ground: 1 min prayer creates a 30 min burst that restores 20 HP to creatures who remain in the area for 10 min
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores HP to self equal to the spell level
Selective Energy: Can choose 5 creatures to be unaffected when casting an area Harm or Heal
Shield Of Faith: Casting a domain spell gives +1 AC for 1 rd
Spellshape Channel: (F) Applies a single-action spellshape action to Harm or Heal
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Surging Focus: (F) Seeing an ally reduced to 0 HP restores 1 Focus Point to self once per day
Swift Banishment: (R) Immediately casts Banishment after a critical hit on an extraplanar foe
Versatile Font: Can use a font for either Harm or Heal
Void Siphon: Critical failure vs. self Harm inflicts drained 1
Zealous Rush: Can Stride 10' while casting a 1-action spell on self, or 25' for a longer spell
Notes
